testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.subtitle: Stables across Sweden use EquiDuty for their daily operations

testimonial1.title: Finally fair!
testimonial1.content: We always had problems with some people doing more than others. Now everything is transparent and fair. The system automatically suggests who should take the next shift based on workload.
testimonial1.author: Anna Lindqvist

testimonial2.title: Saves so much time
testimonial2.content: I used to spend hours coordinating schedules via group chat. Now everything runs automatically and everyone gets reminders in time.
testimonial2.author: Erik Johansson

testimonial3.title: Perfect for us
testimonial3.content: With 15 horses and 20 active members, it was chaos before. Now we have full control and everyone knows exactly what to do and when.
testimonial3.author: Maria Svensson
